title: Azure Container Apps Resource Overview
vision: Prototype the Container Apps resource blade showing running revisions, scaling metrics with sparklines, and ingress configuration at a glance
problem: Need to visualize how the Container Apps overview page would display revision management, scaling health, and ingress settings in the Azure portal
successCriteria: Revisions table shows active/inactive revisions with traffic split percentages
Scaling metrics cards display replica count, CPU, memory, and request rate with sparklines
Ingress configuration panel shows port, transport, FQDN, and security settings
